name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 26, in Xiaogan, Hubei, Tesla was prohibited from entering the parking lot next to the Citizens’ Home to charge. The police responded that this was near the party and government agencies, and Tesla was in sentry mode and was not allowed to enter.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Later, after the car owner’s efforts, the parking lot allowed Tesla to enter, and the property owner apologized to the car owner.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On Xiaohongshu, some medical staff shared the current situation in the hospital: People around them jump off buildings from time to time, but the news is suppressed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 27, agricultural business owners in Southwest Zigong City protested their rights in front of the city government.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 26, a news report about a Hong Kong athlete losing his phone at the Asian Games and Hangzhou volunteers searching through tens of thousands of bags of garbage to find it sparked heated discussion among netizens, who questioned their super-national treatment.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/jPaAdfcqZU

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 27, many netizens discovered that the Weibo APP had opened a special column for Huawei on the user homepage to place Weibo content related to Huawei.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Chinese diplomats were scolded by pinkies for not being populist enough🧐

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 24, two Christians from a Suzhou house church were taken away by local police on charges of illegal gathering.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the canteen of the Zhonglou Foreign Language School in Changzhou, Jiangsu Province was exposed to have serious hygiene problems and provided spoiled food to students.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/2qkihsAIHE

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/wcPAZfpCAn

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 25, in Chengdu, Sichuan, some netizens claimed that a building was painted with the Japanese flag, sparking heated discussions. In fact, it was just graffiti on the outer wall of a kindergarten.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Lianhe Zaobao reported that Xu Jiayin has been placed under residential surveillance by the police

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @Southxdrem Even if I block it, I can't hide it. The comments will still stay in the comment area, and they will create a new account to continue posting the next tweet

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Many netizens have reported the problem of fake pornographic tweets in the comment section.
Unfortunately, I can’t hide or stop them because they blocked me after posting the comments.
I have written countless letters to Twitter, but no one cares about this matter, so I can’t do anything.
I hope everyone can raise the threshold and take the initiative to ignore it. Sorry.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
User contribution
Guangxi Construction Group Fourth Construction Engineering Co., Ltd. issued a notice to encourage employees to start their own businesses and find jobs

A blogger published the 2021 performance bonus clearance plan for civil servants issued by Yangzhou on September 18

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At the same time, Guangxi Construction Engineering Group Fifth Construction Engineering Co., Ltd. issued a special report on the current state of the company, stating that its headquarters suffered serious losses, construction was completely suspended, and wage arrears were serious.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 27, a graduate student from the Civil Aviation University of China wrote a long article complaining that he and three other students were about to graduate but could not continue their thesis because their supervisor retired. He tried to jump from the dormitory that day but was rescued.
